name: Hoot Digital
tagline: MAKE SURE YOU CREATE, ENGAGE, CONVERT
description:
Hoot Digital is an award winning digital marketing consultancy, run by Chris Hutcheson. We have been enjoying the fast paced world of digital since 2000, so have seen some serious changes in that time whilst working for some of Hertfordshire’s top integrated agencies.
During that time, we have gained experience across a variety of industries and have worked with some of the UK’s most well known brands, including Sainsburys, Tescos, Dairylea, Oxfam, Glaxo Smithkline, WD40, Lakeland, The Royal Parks, Beko, Hilton Hotels, Redrow, and Greene King. Hoot was launched in January 2015 to bring a high standard of digital knowledge and thinking to all types of businesses, big and small, but also to provide our core services to creative marketing agencies who do not have their own internal digital departments…we are your digital partner!
